name: Donald Richard RUSCH, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 17th day of June, 2008, the order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
